channel.title: üè¢ School of Data Science, Fudan University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ School of Data Science, Fudan University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: DeMo: Decoupling Motion Forecasting into Directional Intentions and Dynamic States
item.description: DeMo: Decoupling motion forecasting into directional intentions and dynamic states for improved autonomous driving.

item.title: Near-Optimal Distributed Minimax Optimization under the Second-Order Similarity
item.description: SVOGS: Near-optimal distributed minimax optimization is achieved under second-order similarity, balancing communication, computation, and achieving near-optimal complexities.

item.title: SlowFocus: Enhancing Fine-grained Temporal Understanding in Video LLM
item.description: SlowFocus significantly improves fine-grained temporal understanding in video LLMs by using mixed-frequency sampling and a novel multi-frequency attention mechanism.
